statements: SELECT * FROM marketing_strategies WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT strategy_name, user_engagement FROM marketing_strategies WHERE target_audience = 'Young Adults';
SELECT id, strategy_name, conversion_rate FROM marketing_strategies ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience FROM marketing_strategies WHERE conversion_rate < 0.3 AND test_group = 'Group A';
SELECT * FROM marketing_strategies WHERE user_engagement > 1000 ORDER BY user_engagement ASC;
SELECT id, strategy_name FROM marketing_strategies WHERE user_engagement > 100 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC, strategy_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM marketing_strategies WHERE user_engagement IN (50, 75, 100) AND target_audience='Social Media' ORDER BY user_engagement DESC, conversion_rate ASC;
SELECT id, test_group FROM marketing_strategies WHERE user_engagement < 50 OR conversion_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience FROM marketing_strategies WHERE conversion_rate BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.3 ORDER BY target_audience DESC, strategy_name ASC;
SELECT id, strategy_name, user_engagement FROM marketing_strategies ORDER BY user_engagement DESC, id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Marketing_Strategies
SELECT id, strategy_name, conversion_rate FROM Marketing_Strategies
SELECT strategy_name, start_date, end_date FROM Marketing_Strategies
SELECT * FROM A_B_Test_Results
SELECT strategy_id, experiment_group, result, test_date FROM A_B_Test_Results
SELECT id, strategy_name, conversion_rate FROM Marketing_Strategies WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC
SELECT strategy_name, start_date, end_date FROM Marketing_Strategies WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT strategy_name, AVG(conversion_rate) AS avg_conversion_rate FROM Marketing_Strategies GROUP BY strategy_name HAVING AVG(conversion_rate) > 0.7
SELECT id, experiment_group, AVG(result) AS avg_result FROM A_B_Test_Results GROUP BY id, experiment_group HAVING AVG(result) > 50 ORDER BY id ASC, avg_result DESC

SELECT s.id, s.strategy_name, r.experiment_group, r.result FROM Marketing_Strategies s JOIN A_B_Test_Results r ON s.id = r.strategy_id WHERE r.test_date = '2022-05-20' ORDER BY s.id ASC, r.result DESC
SELECT * FROM ab_test_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ab_test_campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT id, campaign_name, budget FROM ab_test_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, conversion_rate, winner FROM ab_test_results WHERE significance_level > 0.05;
SELECT user_id, variation_name, conversion_status FROM ab_test_users WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ab_test_campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ab_test_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY budget ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, variation_name, conversion_rate FROM ab_test_campaigns c INNER JOIN ab_test_results r ON c.id = r.campaign_id WHERE conversion_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT u.user_id, c.campaign_name, r.variation_name FROM ab_test_users u INNER JOIN ab_test_campaigns c ON u.campaign_id = c.id INNER JOIN ab_test_results r ON c.id = r.campaign_id WHERE u.conversion_status = TRUE;

SELECT c.campaign_name, SUM(r.conversion_rate) AS total_conversion FROM ab_test_campaigns c INNER JOIN ab_test_results r ON c.id = r.campaign_id GROUP BY c.campaign_name HAVING total_conversion > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM marketing_strategies;
SELECT id, strategy_name FROM marketing_strategies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM user_segments ORDER BY segment_name DESC;
SELECT group_id, experiment_name, group_description FROM experimental_groups WHERE group_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, group_id, conversion FROM test_results WHERE result_date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_strategies;
SELECT id, strategy_name, start_date FROM marketing_strategies ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, segment_name, segment_description FROM user_segments WHERE segment_name = 'New Users';
SELECT * FROM test_results WHERE conversion = TRUE ORDER BY result_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT group_id, experiment_name, group_description FROM experimental_groups WHERE group_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM MarketingCampaigns
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaigns
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE budget > 5000
SELECT user_id, email, gender FROM Users ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT campaign_id, conversion, revenue FROM CampaignResults WHERE conversion = TRUE
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT campaign_name, strategy, budget FROM MarketingCampaigns JOIN CampaignResults ON MarketingCampaigns.campaign_id = CampaignResults.campaign_id WHERE conversion = TRUE ORDER BY budget DESC
SELECT Users.user_id, Users.email, Users.gender, CampaignResults.revenue FROM Users INNER JOIN CampaignResults ON Users.user_id = CampaignResults.user_id WHERE location = 'New York' AND age > 25
SELECT Users.email, CampaignResults.conversion, CampaignResults.revenue FROM Users LEFT JOIN CampaignResults ON Users.user_id = CampaignResults.user_id WHERE CampaignResults.conversion = TRUE

SELECT MarketingCampaigns.campaign_name, ExperimentGroup.group_name, ExperimentResults.conversion_rate FROM MarketingCampaigns JOIN ExperimentGroup ON MarketingCampaigns.campaign_id = ExperimentGroup.group_id JOIN ExperimentResults ON ExperimentGroup.group_id = ExperimentResults.group_id WHERE ExperimentResults.conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY ExperimentResults.conversion_rate DESC
